sentences.en: " How sheepish men look when they fall, don't they? "
sentences.cn: " 男人在跌倒的时候看上去多么胆怯啊, 是不? ”

sentences.en: Bobby looked at her with a sheepish grin.
sentences.cn: 博比望着她腼腆地咧嘴一笑。

sentences.en: Followed by the sheepish admission of truth. this heralds a period of deeper intimacy.
sentences.cn: 接下来就轮到了“害羞地说出真相”. 这说明你们的关系更深了.

sentences.en: For several days he felt sheepish, but finally Gao Ma's advice prevailed.
sentences.cn: 虽然好几天总觉得不大好意思, 可是高妈的话得到最后的胜利.

sentences.en: He felt sheepish, innocent, but sheepish.
sentences.cn: 他感到局促不安, 尽管问心无愧, 还是局促不安.

sentences.en: He gave me a sheepish look.
Immediately Roger, who a minute before had seemed dignified - more than that, formidable - took on sheepish smile.
sentences.cn: 罗杰在一分钟以前还是挺尊严的 -- 还不止这样, 是令人望而生畏的, -- 这一刹那间却露出了一阵怯懦的微笑.

sentences.en: Mary gave her a sheepish grin.
sentences.cn: 玛丽难为情地冲她咧嘴一笑。

sentences.en: NEW JERSEY: Can the sheepish Vince Carter possibly become the leader the Nets so desperately need?
sentences.cn: 新泽西网队: 软弱的卡特能否成为绝望的网队的领袖?
萨姆看上去有些局促不安。

sentences.en: Soon a sheepish of embarrassmentacross his big red face.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿,他的脸通红,充满了不好意思和局促不安.

sentences.en: The couple leapt apart when she walked in on them and later came downstairs looking sheepish.
sentences.cn: 她走进屋时撞见这对情侣，搞得两人赶紧分开，后来又面带窘色地走下楼来。

sentences.en: The Doctor gives a sheepish grin and says, " I should have told you yesterday! "
sentences.cn: 医生苦笑一声: “ 我应该昨天告诉你这些的. ”

sentences.en: The tall man seemed gratified but sheepish too. He sighed.
sentences.cn: 高个子有点得意,可又惭愧似的,叹了口气.

trans.tran_cn: 羞怯的，腼腆的，（像绵羊一样）驯顺的，胆怯的，局促不安的，胆怯的
